div.p: SEE THE PRESIDENT’S CARVED INTO THE MOUNTAIN.
IT’S A GOOD TRIP. TONIGHT THE FACTOR TIP OF THE
DAY, WHILE PROMOTING HIS WIFE ANGELINA’S NEW TV THE MAN
PUNCHED BRAD PITT. TWO YEARS AGO WILL SMITH SLAPPED
WHAT THE HECK IS YOUR PROBLEM, MAN.
I’M NOT GOING TO TELL YOU THE GUY’S NAME BECAUSE THAT’S WHAT
HE WANTS BUT I’LL SUGGEST TO THE AUTHORITIES IN LOS ANGELES AND
OTHER PLACES THEY CHARGE THAT GUY TO THE MAX BECAUSE THIS KIND
OF STUFF IS DANGEROUS. ALL OF US IN THE PUBLIC EYE KNOW
THAT WE CAN BE HURT IN PUBLIC AT ANY MOMENT.
WE ALL REMEMBER WHAT HAPPENED TO JOHN LENNON.
FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY DIRECTED TO THE POLICE AND AUTHORITIES.
PLEASE TAKE THESE KINDS OF THINGS SERIOUSLY.
SOMEBODY IS GOING TO GET HURT. CAN’T HAVE THESE LOONS RUNNING
AROUND. PLEASE CHECK OUT THE FOX NEWS
FACTOR WEBSITE WHICH IS DIFFERENT FROM BILLOREILLY.COM
AND ALSO, WE WOULD LIKE YOU TO SPOUT OFF ABOUT THE FACTOR FROM
